description: Motion to Game Input Mapping - v2.4 with loop-ready triggers

actions.description: Shoulder press with three states
Boxing guard: both forearms up near head (wrists above shoulders, elbows bent)
Both arms horizontal raise (T-pose-ish) with initial trigger, then loop for tap + long-press outputs.
Left jab: quick straight extension with light position + velocity checks
Right jab: quick straight extension with light position + velocity checks
Looping jumping jacks: fires space each rep; exit if >2s gap.
Detect jumping jacks: jump + legs open (hip-knee-hip angles).
A squat exercise with one-way state flow: ready to descending to complete.
Detect in-place jump by ankle Y rising above recent lowest point.
彈跳碰胸動作，偵測跳躍至空中時，雙膝抬起觸碰胸部的瞬間。

ready.description: 站立準備姿勢，身體直立或微蹲，準備開始下蹲起跳。

descending.description: 下蹲階段，膝蓋與髖部彎曲，為跳躍蓄力。

tuck_complete.description: 動作完成點，跳至空中，膝蓋緊縮靠近胸部。

actions.description: A left front kick with revised logic to accurately detect the kick extension.

chamber.description: Leg is lifted and knee is bent, preparing to kick.

kick_complete.description: Leg is fully extended forward, triggering completion.

actions.description: A right front kick with three states: ready, chambering the leg, and kick completion.

chamber.description: Leg is lifted and knee is bent, preparing to kick.

actions.description: 左直拳，採用精確且無重疊的兩角度條件，確保所有狀態穩定識別，無需修改程式碼。

ready.description: 就緒/防禦姿態。此區間為 'ready' 專屬，由 WES 和 RHS 的初始狀態精確定義。

extending.description: 手臂前送階段。此階段的條件與 'ready' 完全分離，由 RHS 角度的變化觸發。

peak.description: 完全伸展的打擊點，動作的終點。

actions.description: 右直拳，採用精確且無重疊的兩角度條件，確保所有狀態穩定識別，無需修改程式碼。

ready.description: 就緒/防禦姿態。此區間為 'ready' 專屬，由 WES 和 RHS 的初始狀態精確定義。

extending.description: 手臂前送階段。此階段的條件與 'ready' 完全分離，由 RHS 角度的變化觸發。

peak.description: 完全伸展的打擊點，動作的終點。

actions.description: Left uppercut with ready->completed
Right uppercut with ready->completed
Left high knee (high)
Right high knee (high)
High-knee run with explicit start triggers and loop fail stop
左勾拳：LHS 為主分水嶺，WES 為輔助邊界，單向鏈與 exit_time 承襲成功範本。

ready.description: 就緒/預備與收拳回位：軀幹旋轉小且手臂彎曲較大。

extending.description: 發力前送期：軀幹旋轉增加、手臂由彎曲過渡。

peak.description: 擊中峰值：軀幹旋轉最高、手臂彎曲角趨小（勾拳不需完全打直）。

actions.description: 右勾拳：RHS 為主分水嶺，WES 為輔助邊界，單向鏈與 exit_time 承襲成功範本。

ready.description: 就緒/預備與收拳回位：軀幹旋轉小且手臂彎曲較大。

extending.description: 發力前送期：軀幹旋轉增加、手臂由彎曲過渡。

peak.description: 擊中峰值：軀幹旋轉最高、手臂彎曲角趨小（勾拳不需完全打直）。

actions.description: A right high knee strike with adjusted timing for state transitions.

lifting.description: Knee is being lifted towards the chest.

peak.description: Knee reaches the highest point of the strike.

actions.description: A left high knee strike with adjusted timing for state transitions.

lifting.description: Knee is being lifted towards the chest.

peak.description: Knee reaches the highest point of the strike.

actions.description: Arms extended sideways (T-pose-ish). Only arms are checked, relaxed.
Left arm extended sideways. Only left arm checked, relaxed.
Right arm extended sideways. Only right arm checked, relaxed.
Right-hand overhand throw (relaxed): hand above shoulder and arm extends.
Left-hand overhand throw (relaxed): hand above shoulder and arm extends.
Alternating low knee lifts (relaxed): either knee lifts modestly; loop-friendly.
Low high-knee running (relaxed): rapid alternating modest knee lifts.
Low high-knee running (relaxed): rapid alternating modest knee lifts.
